title: Spirit Children of Heavenly Parents
summary: We lived with Heavenly Father as His spirit children before coming to earth.
scriptureText: "Before I formed thee in the belly I knew thee..."
insight: You are known and loved personally by God, even before you were born.

title: The Council in Heaven
summary: Heavenly Father presented His plan for our happiness, centered in Jesus Christ.
scriptureText: We will make an earth whereon these may dwell...
insight: God’s plan is intentional. Your life is part of a loving, eternal design.

title: Agency and Choice
summary: We were given agency to choose whether to follow Jesus Christ.
scriptureText: Satan sought to destroy the agency of man...
insight: Agency is a sacred gift that allows real growth and real love.

title: Birth and a Physical Body
summary: On earth, we receive a physical body and begin a time of learning and testing.
scriptureText: This life is the time for men to prepare to meet God...
insight: Mortality is short but full of opportunities to grow closer to Jesus Christ.

title: Faith and Repentance
summary: We exercise faith in Jesus Christ and repent when we fall short.
scriptureText: We believe that through the Atonement of Christ, all mankind may be saved...
insight: Repentance is a hopeful process that turns us back toward the Savior.

title: Covenants and Ordinances
summary: We make sacred covenants through ordinances like baptism and confirmation.
scriptureText: He that believeth in me, and is baptized, the same shall be saved...
insight: Covenants bind us to Jesus Christ and invite His power into our lives.

title: The Atonement of Jesus Christ
summary: Christ suffered, died, and rose again to overcome sin and death.
scriptureText: He will take upon him the pains and the sicknesses of his people...
insight: Because of the Atonement, Christ understands you perfectly and can strengthen you.

title: Life After Death
summary: When we die, our spirits go to the spirit world to await resurrection.
scriptureText: The spirits of all men... are taken home to that God who gave them life.
insight: Death is not the end; it is a step forward in the plan of our Heavenly Father.

title: Preaching the Gospel in the Spirit World
summary: The gospel is taught to those who did not receive it in mortality.
scriptureText: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead...
insight: God’s mercy reaches beyond the veil; all have a fair chance to accept the gospel.

title: Spirit Paradise and Spirit Prison
summary: Conditions in the spirit world differ based on our choices, but progression is possible.
scriptureText: He went not in person among the wicked and the disobedient... but organized his forces...
insight: Even after death, the Savior continues to bring light, hope, and opportunity.

title: Resurrection
summary: Through Christ, all people will be resurrected and receive immortal bodies.
scriptureText: For as in Adam all die, even so in Christ shall all be made alive.
insight: Resurrection is a universal gift of grace that heals the effects of physical death.

title: Final Judgment
summary: We will stand before God to be judged according to our works and the desires of our hearts.
scriptureText: Our words will condemn us, yea, all our works will condemn us...
insight: The judgment will be perfectly just and perfectly merciful through Jesus Christ.

title: Celestial Kingdom
summary: Those who fully accept Christ, make and keep covenants, and endure in faith receive celestial glory.
scriptureText: They are they who received the testimony of Jesus...
insight: The celestial kingdom is a place of eternal family joy in the presence of Heavenly Father.

title: Terrestrial Kingdom
summary: Honorable people who did not fully accept the gospel in this life inherit terrestrial glory.
scriptureText: These are they who are honorable men of the earth...
insight: God’s plan provides a degree of glory that matches each person’s desire and willingness to follow Him.

title: Telestial Kingdom
summary: Those who persist in sin but eventually accept Christ’s justice and mercy inherit telestial glory.
scriptureText: These are they who are liars, and sorcerers... and whoremongers...
insight: Even the telestial kingdom is a kingdom of glory, showing the breadth of God’s mercy.
